name: Super Market Shopping Mall Sim
description:
Welcome to the grocery paradise! Step into the supermarket simulator world. You will be given missions to do some house grocery so get ready for some fun. This game has so many features to offer you. Withdraw money from ATM and get started with doing grocery shopping missions. This game is so realistic and has a lot of sections: cash counter, section for grocery, fruits and vegetables, ATM.


Enter the supermarket, roam around and explore the market which is going to be exciting as well as challenging. Spend some fun hours at and reach the cash register counter for payment. Follow the arrows inside the game. A cashier knows how to operate the automatic register, accept payments. Show your skills as a pro by playing this game.




Features:

12 grocery missions
Shopping game for kids and moms
Fun game for kids
Attractive super market environment and sound effects



Download & play this game and give us your reviews, so that we can make more games for you.
